Key.Original: Escape from Namalsk(story)
Key.English: Escape from Namalsk(story)

Key.Original: You can find equipment in buildings, you can also search the corpses of zombies with them may be supplies
Key.English: You can find equipment in buildings, you can also search the corpses of zombies with them may be supplies
Key.Russian: Вы можете найти снаряжение в зданиях также вы можете обыскать трупы зомби при них могут быть припасы

Key.Original: Wait until the snow storm is over
Key.English: Wait until the snow storm is over

Key.Original: You need to wait until the snow storm is over
Key.English: You need to wait until the snow storm is over
Key.Russian: Нужно подождать пока закончится снежная буря

Key.Original: Find documents with call sign
Key.English: Find documents with call sign

Key.Original: You need to find documents with the call sign in order to pass yourself by the NAC and call the helicopter for evacuation
Key.English: You need to find documents with the call sign in order to pass yourself by the NAC and call the helicopter for evacuation
Key.Russian: Нужно найти документы с позывными, что бы выдать себя за НАК и вызвать вертолет для эвакуации

Key.Original: Inspect the documents
Key.English: Inspect the documents

Key.Original: Hack the backup transmitter
Key.English: Hack the backup transmitter

Key.Original: We learned the call sign, and we can call a helicopter to fly away, you need to hack a radio station in order to transmit a signal(the transmitter is scanty on the roof)
Key.English: We learned the call sign, and we can call a helicopter to fly away, you need to hack a radio station in order to transmit a signal(the transmitter is scanty on the roof)
Key.Russian: Мы узнали позывные, и можем вызвать вертолет что бы улетать, нужно взломать радиостанцию что бы передать сигнал(передатчик скуорее всего на крыше)

Key.Original: Hack terminal
Key.English: Hack terminal

Key.Original: Find a helicopter
Key.English: Find a helicopter

Key.Original: The helicopter accepted the signal and will wait in the port, you need to find it, and fly away
Key.English: The helicopter accepted the signal and will wait in the port, you need to find it, and fly away
Key.Russian: Вертолет принял сигнал и будет ждать в порту, нужно найти его, и улететь

Key.Original: Find the radio station
Key.English: Find the radio station

Key.Original: Someone got into a helicopter and flew without us, you need to find another radio station and try to contact the pilot
Key.English: Someone got into a helicopter and flew without us, you need to find another radio station and try to contact the pilot
Key.Russian: Кто-то сел в вертолет и улетал без нас, нужно найти другую радиостанцию и попробовать связаться с пилотом

Key.Original: Use the radio station
Key.English: Use the radio station

Key.Original: Find the exit to the roof for evacuation by a helicopter
Key.English: Find the exit to the roof for evacuation by a helicopter
Key.Russian: Найти выход на крышу для эвакуации вертолетом

Key.Original: We managed to contact some civilian pilot, he said that he could take us from the roof of the house, we need to find a way out on one of the roofs
Key.English: We managed to contact some civilian pilot, he said that he could take us from the roof of the house, we need to find a way out on one of the roofs
Key.Russian: Нам удалось связаться с каким-то гражданским пилотом он сказал что сможет забрать нас с крыши дома, нужно найти выход на одну из крыш

Key.Original: Shoot up the signal flaire
Key.English: Shoot up the signal flaire

Key.Original: You need to designate yourself so that the pilot see us, there should be a pair of signal flaire on the roof
Key.English: You need to designate yourself so that the pilot see us, there should be a pair of signal flaire on the roof
Key.Russian: Нужно обозначить себя, что бы пилот увидел нас, на крыше должны быть пара сигнальных ракет

Key.Original: Wait for a helicopter
Key.English: Wait for a helicopter

Key.Original: You need to wait on the roof, the helicopter should be soon
Key.English: You need to wait on the roof, the helicopter should be soon
Key.Russian: Нужно ждать на крыше, вертолет скоро должен прилететь

Key.Original: Find an officer and interrogate
Key.English: Find an officer and interrogate

Key.Original: There was a hope that there is an officer on the military base who should know something from how to get out of the island ...
Key.English: There was a hope that there is an officer on the military base who should know something from how to get out of the island ...
Key.Russian: Осталась надежда на то что на военной базе есть офицер который должен что-то знать как выбраться с острова...

Key.Original: Find a helicopter and fly away from the islandr
Key.English: Find a helicopter and fly away from the island
Key.Russian: Найти вертолет и улететь с острова

Key.Original: The officer said that the supply helicopter had just arrived, we can capture it and fly away from the island
Key.English: The officer said that the supply helicopter had just arrived, we can capture it and fly away from the island
Key.Russian: Офицер рассказал что только что прибыл вертолет снабжения мы можем захватить его и улететь с острова

Key.Original: If the helicopter receives severe damage during the battle, the task will be failed!
Key.English: If the helicopter receives severe damage during the battle, the task will be failed!
Key.Russian: Если вертолет во время боя получит сильное повреждения, задание будет провалено!

Key.Original: Brensk, South of the islands of Namalsk
Key.English: Brensk, South of the islands of Namalsk

Key.Original: The earthquake means that the release is approaching! You have no more than 3 minutes to find a cover! The fortified should be with a durable crust!
Key.English: The earthquake means that the release is approaching! You have no more than 3 minutes to find a cover! The fortified should be with a durable crust!
Key.Russian: Землетрисение значит что приближается выброс! У вас есть не более 3 мин что бы найти укритие! Укритые должно бысть с прочной крышой!

Key.Original: Attention was snowing! This may mean that soon there may be a snow storm!During a snowstorm, you need to be in a building or vehicle!
Key.English: Attention was snowing! This may mean that soon there may be a snow storm!During a snowstorm, you need to be in a building or vehicle!
Key.Russian: Внимание пошел снег! Это может означать что скоро может быть снежная буря! Во время снежной бури вам нужно находится в здании или технике!

Key.Original: During a snow storm, you need to be in a building or technique in other cases you will receive damage!
Key.English: During a snow storm, you need to be in a building or technique in other cases you will receive damage!
Key.Russian: Во время снежного шторма нужно быть в здании или технике в ином случаи Вы будете получать урон!

Key.Original: Use a fire extinguisher
Key.English: Use a fire extinguisher

Key.Original: Fire in the car!
Key.English: Fire in the car!

Key.Original: The last position
Key.English: The last position

Key.Original: Mission completed!
Key.English: Mission completed!

Key.Original: You managed to get out of the island!
Key.English: You managed to get out of the island!

Key.Original: If you liked the mission, see my other missions, good luck!
Key.English: If you liked the mission, see my other missions, good luck!
Key.Russian: Если вам понравилась миссия посмотрите другие мои миссии, УДАЧИ!

Key.Original: Mission failed!
Key.English: Mission failed!

Key.Original: The helicopter was badly damaged
Key.English: The helicopter was badly damaged

Key.Original: The helicopter was seriously damaged and could not take off, you lost the last hope of getting out of the island ...
Key.English: The helicopter was seriously damaged and could not take off, you lost the last hope of getting out of the island ...
Key.Russian: Вертолет был серьезно поврежден, и не сможет взлететь, вы утратили последнюю надежду выбраться с острова...
